<Text:The polka

--------------------
Text: Polka:  It originated in the middle of the 19th century in Bohemia, now part of the Czech Republic.
Triplets:<Polka
2:
--------------------
Text: Polka:  Polka remains a popular folk music genre in many European countries, and is performed by folk artists in the Czech Republic, Germany, Austria, Poland, Croatia, Slovenia, Switzerland, and to a lesser extent in Latvia, Lithuania, the Netherlands, Hungary, Italy, Ukraine, Romania, Belarus, Russia, and Slovakia.
